transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan madam ji.
Executive: Good noon Manish sir, kaise hain?
Customer: Ji, theek hoon madam.
Executive: Aapka na maine complaint dekha tha abhi company ke behalf pe aapne complaint kiya hua tha. Issue hua hai kya?
Customer: Ji madam ji.
Executive: Kya hua kya problem?
Customer: Matlab ye hua madam mere saath ki kisi ne third person party ne mujhe dusri company ke naam se, us company ka malik hu karke mujhse gaadi mangwa diya pehli baat. Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ye ho gaya mere saath scam. Ab usi bande ne jis company mein maal jaana tha, us wo hai na jis company mein maal jaana tha unse baat kar liya meri company ka malik ban ke.
Executive: Aapki company ka malik ban ke unse baat kar liya.
Customer: Unse baat kar liya aur unki company ka malik ban ke mere se baat kar liya. Theek hai?
Executive: To na aapne kuch bhi proof manga ki kaise baat karu aap kaise maang rahe hain?
Customer: Unhone madam ji, wahi, wahi to main bata raha hu, wahi to suno meri baat. Usne kya kiya fir maine verification ke liye uska GST number manga. Theek hai? To us bande ne kiska GST number diya? Jis company ka malik ban ke mere se baat kiya uska GST number diya. Matlab kiska? Gaurian Ganesh wale ka, Gaurian Ganesh Industries Shimla.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai? Uska usne mere ko GST number de diya. Hai na? Ab us company wale ne jab GST number manga hoga to usne de diya mera.
Executive: Kaise aapka matlab GST waha IndiaMART se nikal ke?
Customer: Nahi nahi matlab maine bhai us jab usne mujhse baat kiya to bhai usne mujhe mera GST number manga. Hai na? Are GST number to jaise GST number humse koi mangta hai to hum apni GST se hi copy karke denge na?
Executive: Haan haan wahi to dete hain suno na. To usne mujhe phone karke bola bhai ki hum ye company wale bol rahe hain humko gaadi chahiye Bhilai se Shimla ke liye. Ab maine kya just teen char second pehle kya hai Gauri Ganesh industry wale ne lead dali hogi IndianMART pe. To maine usko seen karke chhod diya uske just turant baad mere paas call aaya ki bhaiya hum ye company wale bol rahe hain humko gaadi chahiye.
Hmm.
Customer: To aisa aisa usne mere saath fraud kar diya aur wahi fraud usne uske saath kiya. Kiska jiska maal tha Gaurian Ganesh wale industry wale ka.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai? Haan ab hua kya maine unki gaadi to lagwa di. Theek hai gaadi gayi meri, maal jaana tha Gaurian Shankar wale ka. Hai na Shimla wale ka. Ab wo jo banda beech mein tha hum dono ke wo le liya paisa unse. Gaurian Ganesh wale se haan unse paisa le liya ab usne mujhe diya hi nahi.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Bhai mujhe, mujhe paisa milenge tab to main gaadi bhejunga. Hmm.
Customer: To usne paise bheje hi nahi. Hmm.
Customer: To ho gaya fraud. Bhai wo jo third person tha jo bhai jo hum logo se dono se baat kar liya wo paise leke farar ab fas gaye hum aur wo bechara maal wala.
Executive: To fir aap fir aapne usse baat kari aapki baat hui?
Customer: Bhai wo to phone band kar diya.
Executive: Nahi nahi main us fraud person ki baat nahi kar rahi hu main us company ki baat kar rahi hu jisme aap.
Customer: Haan un company wale, wo company wale ko bhaiya ko main bola bhaiya aapka maal mere paas rakha hua hai aap apna maal le aa jaiye aur mera godam ka paisa dijiye aur chutti kijiye. Hmm hmm. Aapka maal chori wari nahi hua hai aap FIR karenge to bhi maal mere paas hi baramad hoga agar by chance mere upar sab karwai hoga jab main aapko maal ko bech dunga yadi mere paas nahi milega tab.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: To maine wo uncle ji se maine baat kar liya hai wo uncle ji ko maine bola bhaiya aapka maal mere paas rakha hai aap aake le jao.
Executive: To wo gaya wo leke gaya apna?
Customer: Nahi gaya na madam main to FIR karne ke liye gaya tha. Matlab jo ab unke upar to main karunga nahi kyuki unse to mere ko koi lena dena nahi hai jinka maal hai unse. Theek hai? Par unko ke upar kaise karenge aap kyuki GST to usne kisi aur ka use kiya hua hai na?
Executive: Madam usne meri GST lagwa di na mera bilti faswa diya main to fas gaya acche se. Hmm.
Customer: Haan aur mere saath ek gaadi nahi mere saath to do gaadi ho gaya maine ek gaadi ka 50000 to bhar hi diya hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was defrauded by a third party.

- Third party posed as different company owners.

- Customer's GST was misused, leading to financial loss.



Resolution:

- Customer informed the actual goods owner.

- Goods owner retrieved their goods.

- Customer filed an FIR.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, gst, third party, fir, scam
